name: a REAL game
description:
Welcome. This is a REAL game. 

Features:

  • cute and likeable protagonist (*wink*)
  • (somewhat) challenging platforming levels

Instructions:

  • Use ← and → / A and D to move
  • Use SPACE key to jump
  • The player can slide along wooden walls by pressing arrow key toward the wall
  • The player can jump from while sliding
  • Press R to reset level
  • Press ESC to return from level to level selection scene
  • Press ESC to return from level selection scene to main menu
  • There are cheat codes hidden inside the game
  • Input the codes inside this terminal in order to unlock bonuses
  • (hint: there is a cheat code inside the credits)

Remember. There is nothing suspicious about this game. It's definitely working as intended (*wink*). It's definitely not a cage meant to keep something trapped (*double wink*)

Created by:

  • Andrei-Alin BĂLAȘĂ
  • Alexandru BOARU
  • Vlad-Andrei BOTEZATU

Resources:

  • player model and player animations from Mixamo
  • enemy models and enemy animations from RPG Monster Duo PBR Polyart | 3D Creatures | Unity Asset Store
  • enviroment assets from HYPEPOLY - Isometric Tiles Standart Lite | 3D Environments | Unity Asset Store
  • traps assets from Dungeon Traps | 3D Dungeons | Unity Asset Store
  • background song from Nosoapradio_us
  • sound effects from Zapsplat
